Name: John
description:
John is a resident of Kasensero in Kyotera district, 43 years old and married with four school-going children.

He deals majorly in coffee production but also has a retail shop where he gets secondary income for survival. Running two businesses at a time is hectic and requires capital availability.

He is therefore seeking a loan to buy manure and pesticides to spray his farm that has been hit by the coffee berry borer. With this done he will reduce losses incurred and better the harvest quality. Thank you funders.
